title: QoS ( Quality of Service) Setup.
body:
I have looked at the tutorials of setting it up but my layout its completely different to what I have seen. If you could help me with what to put in the boxes that would be greatful. I need to set it up because I have about 4-5 people on the internet at one time and I am getting extreme ping spikes. Also, I dont know whether to use NAT or QoS. 
Thank you.

replies.body: That looks complicated. Did your modem come with a manual?
